title: Trading Fonts for Translation
content:
I would like to translate my site ( [http://atomicmedia.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803110743/http:/atomicmedia.net/) ) into:   
   
Dutch   
French   
German   
Spanish   
   
This is the file that I would like translated:   
   
 [http://x.itsamac.com/~atomicmedia/temp/translate.txt](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803110743/http:/x.itsamac.com/~atomicmedia/temp/translate.txt)   
   
I would like to trade my font library for these translations. If you would like to do this please send an email to [matthew@atomicmedia.net](mailto:matthew@atomicmedia.net) before you start so I can make sure you are not duplicating someone elses effort.   
   
Thanks,   
   
Matthew Bardram   
   
Atomic Media Fonts
author: bardram
